name: Arms Racers
description:
Take control of an armadillo from another time, and race against you competitors to determine which era is the fastest.

Roll with up to 4 players in this fast-paced armadillo race!

Controls:
Controller (Xbox)-
Left Stick - Move
Right Stick - Move Camers
A - Jump
X - Boost (Only in air)

1 level right now, looking to add additional content soon.

The team:

Rob Mastroieni, Ryan Chang, Mackenzie Wilson, Marco Giardina, James Bews, Ashley Simmons, Sabrina Page, Austin Manuel, Leslie Constantino, Mauricio Parra, Chris Evans
